statements: SELECT * FROM public_meetings_and_hearings;
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_date, meeting_location FROM public_meetings_and_hearings;
SELECT meeting_description FROM public_meetings_and_hearings WHERE meeting_location = 'City Hall';
SELECT * FROM public_meetings_and_hearings ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_location FROM public_meetings_and_hearings WHERE meeting_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM public_meetings_and_hearings;
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_date, meeting_location FROM public_meetings_and_hearings WHERE meeting_location = 'City Hall';
SELECT * FROM public_meetings_and_hearings WHERE meeting_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT meeting_description FROM public_meetings_and_hearings WHERE meeting_location LIKE '%Community%';
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_date, meeting_location, meeting_description FROM public_meetings_and_hearings ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_date, meeting_location FROM public_meetings;
SELECT * FROM public_meetings WHERE meeting_location = 'City Hall';
SELECT meeting_date, attendees, notes FROM public_meetings ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT meeting_location, COUNT(*) as total_meetings FROM public_meetings GROUP BY meeting_location;
SELECT meeting_location, MAX(meeting_date) as latest_meeting FROM public_meetings;
SELECT * FROM public_meetings WHERE meeting_location = 'City Hall' ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_date, attendees FROM public_meetings WHERE ARRAY_LENGTH(attendees, 1) > 5;
SELECT meeting_date, meeting_location FROM public_meetings WHERE meeting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM hearings WHERE hearing_location = 'Courtroom' AND notes IS NOT NULL ORDER BY hearing_date ASC;
SELECT hearing_date, case_name FROM hearings WHERE recording_url IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM meetings;
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_date, meeting_time FROM meetings ORDER BY meeting_date ASC;
SELECT meeting_description FROM meetings WHERE meeting_location = 'Conference Room A';
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email FROM attendees WHERE meeting_id = 1;
SELECT agenda_item_title, agenda_item_description FROM agenda_items WHERE meeting_id = 2 ORDER BY agenda_item_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM meetings ORDER BY meeting_date DESC, meeting_time ASC;
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_description FROM meetings WHERE meeting_location = 'Conference Room A';
SELECT attendees.attendee_name, meetings.meeting_date FROM attendees JOIN meetings ON attendees.meeting_id = meetings.meeting_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_meetings FROM meetings;
SELECT * FROM meetings WHERE meeting_location LIKE '%Zoom%' ORDER BY meeting_date;

SELECT meeting_title, meeting_date FROM public_meetings;

SELECT topic_title, topic_description FROM meeting_topics ORDER BY topic_title DESC;

SELECT meeting_title, meeting_location FROM public_meetings WHERE meeting_location = 'New York';
SELECT meeting_title, meeting_date FROM public_meetings ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email FROM meeting_attendees WHERE attendee_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT meeting_title, topic_title, topic_description FROM public_meetings JOIN meeting_topics ON public_meetings.meeting_id = meeting_topics.meeting_id;
SELECT * FROM public_meetings ORDER BY meeting_date DESC, meeting_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT meeting_description, meeting_location FROM public_meetings WHERE meeting_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email FROM meeting_attendees WHERE attendee_status = true;

SELECT document_name, document_path FROM meeting_documents WHERE document_type = 'Agenda';
